ygData.subject: Re: A bit off topic but...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m only level 7 but I did notice, during my travels, that the third windmill in steamfont is a good place to start. I ve heard you can make compasses and
ygData.messageBody:
I'm only level 7 but I did notice, during my travels, that the third windmill in
steamfont is a good place to start.

I've heard you can make compasses and collapsable fishing poles, and compasses
comand quite a premium on the market (good bye sense heading).

Does anybody know the advantages of the collapsable fishing pole?
What else can you make?

By the way tinkering was my sole reason for creating a gnome.

Malkin

Paul McClung wrote:

> From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
>
> I'm a 12th (almost 13th WhoooHooo!) Gnome wizard and I would like to do
> what all Gnomes do best and that is tinker.
>
> Has anyone else done any tinkering? What did you make? Was it hard to
> make, was it useful, were you able to sell it for profit? Where did you
> get the parts... how did you figure out how to make it? etc... etc...
>
> Flik
